name: Evi & Maxim
description:
What would a couple say when they had to tell you about their three best moments? This is Maxim & Evi's love story. Plunge in! ... and as you know ... love is all about wanting to push long enough.

Controls
Any button will work!
ESC is used for closing the application though.

Have fun!

Disclaimer : The game has no sound or music. This is because the game will be played during a wedding party where this would interfere with the music of the venue.
